description: Percentage of holes in which at least C1 was reached in regulation. This also counts for C2 in Regulation
Percentage of holes in which at least C2 was reached in regulation.
Percentage of holes in which a throw lands within the bullseye (3.3m from the target) in regulation. This also counts for C1 in Regulation and C2 in Regulation.
Percentage of putts made from within C1X.
Percentage of putts made from within C2.
Percentage of holes in which a player made birdie or better.
Percentage of holes in which a player made double bogey or worse.
Percentage of holes in which a player made bogey.
Percentage of holes in which a player made par.
The total distance of made putts within C1 or C2.
The average distance of made putts within C1 or C2.
